subtitle: Tangy lemon tart made from fromage frais and lemons.

method.text: Roll out the pastry on a lightly floured surface and use to line a 20 cm round deep-sided flan tin, trimming off any excess pastry.
Bake blind for 10 min before removing the baking beans. Return the pastry case to the oven and cook for 5 min or until the pastry is crisp.

Beat all the filling ingredients together until well mixed. Carefully pour into the pastry case. Reduce oven temperature to 190°C. Return the filled pastry case to the oven and cook for about 30 min until just set firm.
Remove tart from the oven. Leave to cool completely.
Sift a little icing sugar over the tart. Chill well and serve in slices.

title: Lemon tart
